alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Pontotoc (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 8:16PM CST until February 15 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL GARVIN AND WEST CENTRAL PONTOTOC COUNTIES... At 815 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Vanoss, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Stratford and Vanoss. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
